headline: How to hack a hospital? Scada ICCShacking
description:
Hello everyone
 My name is Semih.  I am an 18 year old hacker.  Actually, it would be more accurate to say SCADA/ICS and OSINT hacker.  Today I'm going to talk to you about hacking critical industrial control systems.  When I first started this business, there were not many resources on the internet, so I decided to write this blog.  I want to inspire you by writing an incident that happened to me First of all, I must say that scada hacking is not like other types of hacking.  Thanks to the scada system you hacked, you can sometimes cut off the electricity of a city, and sometimes cause dozens of planes to crash at an airport.
 I was doing bug bounty when I was 16 years old.  I suffered many injustices and did not receive any money.  I wanted to focus on a more serious field.  First, I targeted a sector (health sector).  Then I chose a country and chose India.  The reason they chose India was because they produced thousands of unsafe software.  I then identified a suitable company (www.meddiff.com).  Then I found the ip address of the software the company sells (I won't tell you how I found these ip addresses).  I then discovered an incorrect security configuration in the system.  I was able to enter the hospital system by taking advantage of this vulnerability and I was very surprised.  Because I had the citizenship information, phone numbers, loads of connected devices and bank accounts of thousands of patients and doctors.  I discovered 100 more hospitals affected by this vulnerability.  I infiltrated all these hospitals.  Later, I wrote an e-mail to the company that produced this software, but even after 6 months, there was still no progress.  I reported this to the Indian consulate in my country.  They also directed me to the ministry of defense.  I was promised a monetary reward by the company, but they did not. And they closed the gap.
                                                    If you have more questions about Scada/ICS hacking, you can reach me on Instagram.
  @32smh32
headline_zh-Hans: 如何黑掉一家医院？Scada ICCShacking
headline_zh-Hant: 如何黑掉一家醫院？Scada ICCShacking
description_zh-Hans:
大家好
 我的名字是Semih。 我是一个18岁的黑客。 事实上，说是SCADA/ICS和OSINT黑客更准确。 今天我要和大家谈谈黑掉关键工业控制系统的问题。 当我刚开始做这个行业时，互联网上没有多少资源，所以我决定写这个博客。 我想通过写一个发生在我身上的事件来启发你们 首先，我必须说，scada黑客与其他类型的黑客不同。 由于你入侵的scada系统，你有时可以切断一个城市的电力，有时可以导致几十架飞机在机场坠毁。
 我在16岁的时候就开始做漏洞赏金。 我遭受了许多不公正的待遇，没有收到任何钱。 我想把注意力放在一个更严肃的领域。 首先，我瞄准了一个部门（卫生部门）。 然后我选择了一个国家，选择了印度。 之所以选择印度，是因为他们生产了成千上万的不安全软件。 然后我确定了一个合适的公司（www.meddiff.com）。 然后我找到了该公司销售的软件的ip地址（我不会告诉你我是如何找到这些ip地址的）。 然后我发现系统中的安全配置不正确。 我利用这个漏洞进入了医院的系统，我感到非常惊讶。 因为我有成千上万的病人和医生的公民身份信息、电话号码、连接设备的负载和银行账户。 我又发现了100家受此漏洞影响的医院。 我潜入了所有这些医院。 后来，我给生产这个软件的公司写了一封电子邮件，但即使过了6个月，仍然没有任何进展。 我向印度驻我国的领事馆报告了此事。 他们还指引我去找国防部。 该公司答应给我一笔钱奖励，但他们没有。而他们关闭了这个缺口。
                                                    如果你有更多关于Scada/ICS黑客攻击的问题，你可以在Instagram上联系我。
  @32smh32
